titleStmt.title: Threni Hybernici, or, Ireland sympathizing with England and Scotland in a sad lamentation for the loss of their Josiah represented in a sermon at Christ-Church in Dublin before His Excellency the Lord Deputy, with divers of the nobility, gentry, and commonality there assembled, to celebrate a funeral solemnity upon the death of the late Lord Protector / by Dr. Harrison ...
titleStmt.author: Harrison, Thomas, 1619-1682.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E. Cotes and are to be sold by John North ...,

notesStmt.note: Caption title: Ireland's lamentation for the loss of their Josiah.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
